channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Illegal criminal activity drug taking. This is a regular spot for antisocial behaviour. What is the council doing about this illegal activity., 12th July
item.description:
Gas and air canisters left abandoned late night cars pulling up antisocial behavior drug users loitering. Hackney Council do nothing about antisocial behavior set for leave residents to suffer the consequences.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brinkworth Way, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
